titleStmt.title: SII 8.72: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 72. (A.R. No. 483 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti . śrī manumahāmaṇḍalīśvaraN harirāyavibhāṭaN bhāṣaikku tappurāyar kaṇṭaṉ muvarāyarkaṇṭaṉ pūrvvadakṣiṇapacśimasamudrādipati śrīhariyappa Uṭaiyar kumārar vīraviruppaṇṇa Uṭaiyar pṛdhivirājyaM paṇṇiyaruḷaāniṉṟa śakābdaM 1000 3 100 10 1ṉmel cellāniṉṟa tulānāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu tṛtīyaiyuM veḷḷikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa rohiṇi nāḷ śuklavaruṣaM
Āṉimātam 2 Ilakkiccanāyinārāṉa Arappāḷatevaṟku kal veṭṭikkuṭuttapaṭi . vūr nāṭu kiḻpaṟṟu pun ṉāttūr EllaiIl taāṉṟippaḷḷamum mūlāntikkollaiyum puñcainilamāy Itu kāṭu veṭṭi Entalum kaṇṭu kiṇaṟum kuḻittu nattamum kaṇṭu kuṭiyum Ēṟṟi karampum tiritti Accukkaṭṭākki payiṟ ceyyakaṭavarākavum payiṟ ceyyumiṭattu Inta Entalkaḷukku caṇḍeśvaraperuvilai
Āka niccayitta mūlāntikkollaikku paṇam 10 5m tāṉṟippaḷḷattukku paṇam 10m Āka paṇam 2 10 5m pāḻeṟṟattukku mutalāka celavākkavum Inta Ental Arippāḷatevarentaleṉṟum Ilakkiccanāyinār Entaleṉṟum Oḻuku Eḻutippotavum Inta Entalkaḷ tamakku tāṉātemaṉam vilai Oṟṟip parikkiṟaiyattukkum Urittuāvatu Ākavum Inta Entalu
kku kiḻ koḷḷa nicceyitta kāṭu veṭṭi karampu tirutti Accukkaṭṭu Ākap payirceyta nilattukku veli Oṉṟukku Aṉaittāṇṭaikkum pacānam payircceyta nilattukku veli Oṉṟukku nellu Aimpatiṉkalamum navirai payirceyta nilattukku veli Oṉṟukku muppattueḻu kalaṉe tūṇip patakku nellum Aḷakkum
payiṟu veli Oṉṟukku Irutūṇi celavākavum pacānanavirai payiṟceyta nilattukku veli Oṉṟukkup poṉvarikku paṇam patiṉeḻaraiyum cantivikkiramattukku paṇam Iraṇṭaraiyum kāttikaippoṉṉukku paṇam Oṉṟum kāṇikkaikku paṇam 10 6 1/2m Āka paṇam 3 10 7 1/2m celavākkavum . Ippaṭi ve kuṭiyum Eṟṟi Ūraṭaṅkalum payiṟceytu candrāditya
varaiyum Aṉupavittuppokavum . Itu paṉmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 8.72 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
